With a full tan and an empty wallet Mr Bean and Teddy have arrived home in LONDON! What a brilliant holiday that was! Timeline Photos
It’s the last stop on Mr Bean and Teddy’s Summer Holiday and they are on familiar ground. Can you spot Teddy one last time and work out which city they are in? Timeline Photos

Yes, home sweet home!  Nelson’s Column in Trafalgar Square, London.
Mr Bean and Teddy had a really fun holiday! Timeline Photos
Final destination.  What are Mr Bean and Teddy  in front of today? Timeline Photos
Mr Bean and Teddy travel 2,795 miles/4,496kms to find themselves in front of an impressive ancient structure in a very hot place.  But what is this structure? Timeline Photos

Mr Bean really tries to make this selfie a good one.  Oh dear, he can’t get the camera angle right.  In front of which famous building are Mr Bean and Teddy.  Clue: it was built in marble and represents the love of a husband for his wife! Timeline Photos
Yes!  That’s right! Mr Bean and Teddy are posing in front of the Eiffel Tower! Timeline Photos
Ta Da! Mr Bean and Teddy are posing in front of The Statue of Liberty, New York!! Timeline Photos
